title: How to Make a Sunset Scene Pen and Pencil Holder

steps.headline: Assemble the stuff needed for making the pen and pencil holder.
Take the toilet paper roll and make slits at its base using a cutter/scissor.
Fold the slits horizontally, so that the slits face outside.
Put glue on the bottom part of the slits.
Take the CD and paste the toilet paper roll on it.
steps.description: The base of your pen and pencil holder is ready.

steps.headline: Take a bowl and fill one-third of the bowl with water.
Fill the second-third of the bowl with glue.
Mix both the water and glue together with a thick brush.
Tear the newspaper into small pieces.
Paste the bits of newspaper on the toilet paper roll with the paste(glue and water) you had created.
Cover the CD with the bits.
Tear tissue paper into small pieces and top the newspaper coating with the tissue paper and the paste.
Allow the structure to dry for a few hours.
steps.description: This gives a thickness to the structure.

steps.headline: Start beautifying your masterpiece.
Fill two bowls with water; take your paints, pencil and brushes.
Draw a sunset scene with pencil.
steps.description: The scenery should contain curved mountains at the top. Behind one of the mountain raw a half-set sun.

steps.headline: Below the mountains draw a sea.
steps.description: Leave some space below the sea. Don't forget to show the waves.

steps.headline: At the bottom,right corner draw a tree.
In front of the tree draw a small hut.
First of all, paint the top of the sky with red and the bottom of the sea also with red.
Take the orange paint and paint with it next to the place where you have applied red.
steps.description: Paint the sun also with orange. Apply orange where the sea ends and the sand has been drawn.

steps.headline: Apply yellow to the remaining portions of the sky,sea and sand.
Before the three colours dry, merge them well with each other with water.
Paint the mountains,tree and the hut with black.
steps.description: Draw the sea waves also with black.

steps.headline: When the paint dries give a beautiful border with black colour and let it dry for few hours.
Place it on your desk and show-off in front of your friends and seniors!

The scenery should contain curved mountains at the top. Behind one of the mountain raw a half-set sun. Below the mountains draw a sea. Leave some space below the sea. Don't forget to show the waves. At the bottom,right corner draw a tree.  In front of the tree draw a small hut.  First of all, paint the top of the sky with red and the bottom of the sea also with red.  Take the orange paint and paint with it next to the place where you have applied red. Paint the sun also with orange. Apply orange where the sea ends and the sand has been drawn.
